amendment.description: Amendment sought to require a GAO report on the increase in sulfur dioxide and other air pollution emissions that result from this Act and the effect of such emissions on public health.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 114-453 to require a GAO report on the increase in sulfur dioxide and other air pollution emissions that result from this Act and the effect of such emissions on public health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bera amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 235 (Roll no. 120).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Bera.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bera amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 235 (Roll no. 120).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
